lead_paragraph: The World Trade Organization ruled that European government subsidies gave the European aircraft maker an unfair advantage over Boeing.
snippet: The World Trade Organization ruled that European government subsidies gave the European aircraft maker an unfair advantage over Boeing.

headline.main: In Ruling, W.T.O. Faults Europe Over Aid to Airbus
headline.seo: W.T.O. Says Subsidies Helped Airbus to Best Boeing
headline.print_headline: In Ruling, W.T.O. Faults Europe Over Aid to Airbus
